definition: lit. extreme saturation (idiom)/fig. vividly and thoroughly/in great detail/without restraint/(of a performance) brilliant
to be drenched with blood/dripping blood

sentences.english: But his eyes were also bleeding.

sentences.english: Verbal jokes use this element to the greatest level possible.
